entry.title: titanite07/Dhwanify2.0: Dhwanify is a lightweight, open-source music player built with Electron and React. It offers a modern and intuitive user interface for local audio playback, music organization, and downloading capabilities. Dhwanify also features real-time audio visualization, making your music experience visually engaging.
entry.content: Dhwanify is a lightweight, open-source music player built with Electron and React. It offers a modern and intuitive user interface for local audio playback, music organization, and downloading capabilities. Dhwanify also features real-time audio visualization, making your music experience visually engaging.

entry.title: zenokit/zeno: Zeno is a zero-dependency, lightweight web framework for TypeScript, designed for maximum simplicity and flexibility. It provides intuitive file-based routing and makes building APIs and web applications straightforward while ensuring high performance.

entry.title: iamkanishka/NativeThreads: Threads Clone is a modern social networking mobile app built with NativeScript Angular, designed for real-time interactions, seamless user experience, and smooth animations. Users can create threads, engage with comments and likes, receive real-time notifications, and share media—all in a lightweight and native mobile experience. 🚀

Users can create threads, engage with comments and likes, receive real-time notifications, and share media—all in a lightweight and native mobile experience. 🚀
